name: Stepper
desc: A material stepper widget that displays progress through a sequence of steps. Steppers are particularly useful in the case of forms where one step requires the completion of another one, or where multiple steps need to be completed in order to submit the whole form.

fields.name: steps
fields.desc: The steps of the stepper whose titles, subtitles, icons always get shown.

fields.name: physics
fields.desc: How the stepper's scroll view should respond to user input.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: An object that can be used to control the position to which this scroll view is scrolled.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of stepper that determines the layout. In the case of [StepperType.horizontal], the content of the current step is displayed underneath as opposed to the [StepperType.vertical] case where it is displayed in-between.

fields.name: currentStep
fields.desc: The index into [steps] of the current step whose content is displayed.

fields.name: onStepTapped
fields.desc: The callback called when a step is tapped, with its index passed as an argument.

fields.name: onStepContinue
fields.desc: The callback called when the 'continue' button is tapped.

fields.name: onStepCancel
fields.desc: The callback called when the 'cancel' button is tapped.

fields.name: controlsBuilder
fields.desc: The callback for creating custom controls.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The elevation of this stepper's [Material] when [type] is [StepperType.horizontal].

fields.name: connectorThickness
fields.desc: The thickness of the connecting lines.

fields.name: stepIconBuilder
fields.desc: Callback for creating custom icons for the [steps].

fields.name: stepIconHeight
fields.desc: Overrides the default step icon size height.

fields.name: stepIconWidth
fields.desc: Overrides the default step icon size width.

fields.name: stepIconMargin
fields.desc: Overrides the default step icon margin.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: The [Step.content] will be clipped to this Clip type.
